algorithm_technique: Iterate through time series, summing durations and subtracting overlaps.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate total poisoned time when Teemo attacks with a poison duration and cooldown.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through attack times, adding full duration, then subtracting overlap between consecutive attacks.
key_insights: The total poisoned duration is the sum of individual poison durations, minus any overlapping periods.
An overlap occurs when the next attack happens before the current poison effect ends.
